main event: A UFO sighting reported in Amarillo, Texas on June 6, 1966, involving two objects observed for approximately 10 minutes.
interesting points: The observer described the object as a light about as bright as the North Star.,The object traveled across the sky and was lost to sight after approximately five minutes.,The sighting is concluded to be a possible satellite observation.,No photographs were included in the report.,The weather conditions were very clear with high winds at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: two bright lights in the sky
witness description: Civilian observer who noted previous sightings.
